CustomField.description: This field specifies in text description of the borrower’s or co-borrower’s enrolled or principal tribe(s) if 1 (American Indian or Alaska Native) is entered.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If American Indian or Alaska Native is selected as a Race, this text field allows you to specify the enrolled or principal tribe. You may enter up to 50 characters.
CustomField.label: American Indian or Alaska Native tribe
